title: How do you upload your files to a web server?
summary: If you have built a simple web page (see HTML basics for an example), you will probably want to put it online, on a web server. In this article we'll discuss how to do that, using various available options such as SFTP clients, RSync and GitHub.
short_title: How do you upload your files to a web server?
